import './ProductView.css'; function ProductView() { const product = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("currentProduct")); console.log(product); const addToCart = () => { if (localStorage.getItem('cart') == null) { localStorage.setItem("cart", JSON.stringify([])); } var cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart")); cart } return (

{product.name}

{product.description}

current price: {product.price}

) } export default ProductView;
